QuestData.Title: Carentan's Payment
QuestData.Description:
Well done, my friend. Well done, indeed.
You see that dusty crate in the corner of the room? You'll find it contains the ancient scroll and a generous purse of gold, as we agreed.
Please, take your reward. You've certainly earned it.
QuestData.RewardText: <As your head clears up, you see gold pieces scattered about the room.>
